column5: I'm curious if anyone has fished Kramer Lake (north of Kenora, Ont. close to the English River area). Also, Paint Pot Lake, north of Separation Lake. Any good catches? I'm thinking of taking a trip up to that area soon.

I know people who have fished Paintpot,they have caught a lot of fish there up to 5 lbs.I have fished Kramer myself,have caught some fish,but not a lot.Kramer is fairly close to Kenora,and is fished heavily on the weekends by Manitobans who have summer cottages in the town of ReddittLarry S
